sentence.Network_en: A number of governments banned the ship from their territorial waters.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多国家都禁止那艘船进入其领海。

sentence.Network_en: The Sioux had always fought other tribes for territorial rights.
sentence.Network_cn: 苏人总是为领地权与其他部落作战。

sentence.Network_en: Two cats or more in one house will also exhibit territorial behaviour.
sentence.Network_cn: 一家若有两只或更多的猫，也会表现出争夺地盘的行为。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from late Latin territorialis, from Latin territorium (see territory)

entry.def: Territorial means concerned with the ownership of a particular area of land or water.

example.ex: It is the only republic which has no territorial disputes with the others...
example.tran: 它是唯一和其他国家没有领土争端的共和国。

example.ex: Both Chile and Argentina feel very strongly about their territorial claims to Antarctica.
example.tran: 智利和阿根廷对于南极的领土主张都持强硬态度。

entry.def: In Britain, the Territorials are the members of the Territorial Army .

entry.tran: (动物或其行为)地盘意识强的，占地为王的
entry.def: If you describe an animal or its behaviour as territorial, you mean that it has an area which it regards as its own, and which it defends when other animals try to enter it.

example.ex: Two cats or more in one house will also exhibit territorial behaviour.
example.tran: 一家若有两只或更多的猫，也会表现出争夺地盘的行为。

means.word_mean: 1. nonprofessional soldier member of a territorial military unit
1. of or relating to a territory;

sentences.sentence: "the territorial government of the Virgin Islands"

means.word_mean: 2. displaying territoriality; defending a territory from intruders;
3. of or relating to the local vicinity;

auth_sentence.content: It is not about territorial or resource nationalism either.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is not about territorial or resource nationalism either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is not about territorial or resource nationalism either.

auth_sentence.content: The territorial and boundary dispute has not been resolved.
auth_sentence.res_content: The territorial and boundary dispute has not been resolved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The territorial and boundary dispute has not been resolved.

auth_sentence.content: North Korea also objects to the Japanese territorial claims.
auth_sentence.res_content: North Korea also objects to the Japanese territorial claims.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: North Korea also objects to the Japanese territorial claims.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =earth,表示"土地"; 2. =frighten,可怕,恐惧; 3. =frighten,表示"恐,怕"

stems_affixes.value_cn: [comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
stems_affixes.word_buile: extra外+terrestrial[adj.地球的，地球上的]→adj.[comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的
subterrane[n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室]+ean→adj.地下的
terr土地+estrial→adj.地球的，地球上的
territory[n.领土;版图;领域,范围]+ial……的→territorial领土的
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ent……的→deterrent威慑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很糟的;可怕的,骇人的;极度的,厉害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+ible可..的→可怕的
terr恐,怕+ific产生……的→带来可怕→好到让人可怕的地步→极好的
extra外+territorial[adj.领土的,土地的,地方的]+ity表名词→n.治外法权
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下层; 洞穴, 地下室
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+terr土地+ane→n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室
terr土地+ace→n.平台,阳台,露台
terr土地+ain表名词→n.地势,地形
terr土地+it+ory场所,范围→地的范围,领土
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ment表名词→n.制止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+or表名词→n.恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
terror恐怖+ist人→n.恐怖分子
dis离,出+inter埋→v.挖出,掘土
in进+ter=terr土地→v.埋葬
de去+ter=terr恐,怕→吓跑了,吓得不动了
terr恐,怕+ify使……→v.使害怕,使惊恐

sentences.en: We must respect each other’s territorial integrity.
sentences.cn: 我们应当尊重彼此的领土完整。

sentences.en: The country is fighting to preserve its territorial integrity.
sentences.cn: 该国在为保持领土的完整而进行斗争。

sentences.en: They were not allowed to fish in our territorial waters.
sentences.cn: 不允许他们在我国领海捕鱼。

sentences.en: The whole nation speak as one man on this issue concerning national sovereignty and territorial integrity.
sentences.cn: 在这个事关国家主权和领土完整的问题上,全体国民意见一致。

sentences.en: The important question is whether he is prepared to go to war to achieve his territorial ambitions.
sentences.cn: 重要的问题是他是否已准备好发动战争以实现他的领土野心。
